Course Description: DEFINES THE OBJECTIVES OF ACCOUNTING AND THEIR RELATIONSHIP TO BUSINESS THROUGH FUNDAMENTAL CONCEPTS AND PRINCIPLES.TOPICS INCLUDE THEORIES OF DEBITS AND CREDITS, CLASSIFICATION OF ACCOUNTS, JOURNALIZING, PREPARATION OF FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND USE OF A TRIAL BALANCE.  ACCRUAL METHOD ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES ARE DISCUSSED WITH END‐OF‐YEAR PROCEDURES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
